fabfile module¶

Fab file, commands for this application

@author: Noel Wilson

fabfile.clear_load_test()[source]¶
fabfile.create_test_data()[source]¶
fabfile.docker_bash(machine_name='')[source]¶

Start a shell in the id of the container passed in Run with ‘fab docker_bash:$CONTAINER_ID/CONTAINER_NAME’

Param:machine_name: docker image name
Returns:ip address of docker instance to connect to in a browser
fabfile.docker_compose(build=None, prod=None)[source]¶

Start docker compose with django container and postgres container in develop mode

Param:build string if ‘True’ rebuild docker image
Param:prod Boolean if ‘True’ then use prod docker compose file
fabfile.docker_ip(machine_name='default')[source]¶

Print the ip address of docker instance to connect to in a browser Run with ‘fab docker_ip:$CONTAINER_ID/CONTAINER_NAME’

Param:machine_name: docker image name
fabfile.generate_docs()[source]¶

Auto generate docs settings for this project, will documentation folder in /docs/ :return: None

fabfile.hash_tag_battle(id)[source]¶

Get the results of a hash tag battle

Param:id: battle id of battle created in admin console

fabfile.test()[source]¶
fabfile.update_docs()[source]¶

Rebuild documentation from python doc strings :return:

fabfile.web()[source]¶

Run a server that will be accessable from inside a container on port 8000
